Presentation.title-description: Frontend developer focused on UI/UX, specialized in developing modern, intuitive and high-impact interfaces. I combine creativity and technical expertise to transform ideas into digital experiences that delight and generate results.
Presentation.about-description: My development journey is driven by the constant search for innovative solutions and excellence in performance and usability. With a focus on <react>ReactJS</react>, <next>NextJS</next> e <ts>Typescript</ts>, I transform complex ideas into elegant and responsive interfaces.
Presentation.projects-description: Here are some of my most relevant works, which demonstrate my proficiency and dedication in building high-quality user interfaces. Each project reflects my approach to solving complex problems with creative and efficient solutions.
